articles.description: China reported a record trade surplus for 2022, as its key export sector delivered robust growth for most of last year, providing much-needed support for the world's second largest economy that's hammered by its zero-Covid policy.

articles.title: Opinion | The FTC's Breathtaking Power Grab Over Noncompete Agreements - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Its proposed prohibition would quash 47 state laws and 30 million contracts.
articles.content: The Federal Trade Commissions ban on noncompete agreements may be the most audacious federal rule ever proposed. If finalized, it would outlaw terms in 30 million contracts and pre-empt laws in virtu… [+343 chars]

articles.author: Zach Griff
articles.title: Newark’s stunning new Terminal A is now open, but with serious 1st-day hiccups - The Points Guy
articles.description: Newark's new, 33-gate Terminal A is a massive improvement compared to the antiquated facility that it replaces. Four airlines are already callling it home.
articles.content:
Hours-long delays, a power outage and a security breach werent what passengers were expecting from the brand-new Terminal A at Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR) on Thursday, Jan. 12.
